TopicTitle: Anyone know why Advanced Filters sometime stop working?

Articles.Content:
Cheers, fellow Kastronauts!

When building rockets if I turn on Advanced Options with the filters by size and subassemblies... once I do that I can no longer select any objects, nor get back to simple option... it is sort of dead until I go to another building and then come back...

As long as I don't do the advanced everything works fine. I'm assuming it's some mod since I never used to have this problem when playing stock, but trying to uninstall and reinstall 50 mods one at a time is a pain, so if someone has had this and knows what the cause is, please let me know!

I did fix another similar problem by going back to dx9 rather than dx11. But that may be unrelated.

Edited April 8, 2019 by Atlas Gaming

Sounds like this issue:

By adding a custom MM patch with these lines: 

@PART[*]:HAS[~bulkheadProfiles[]]
{
	bulkheadProfiles = srf
}

you should be fine again. If you are interested in the backgrounds, just read a bit in the linked thread
That did it! - I did uninstall a couple of mods too, but I'm assuming this snip of code did it. Thanks - issue closed.
